processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: Think about what must happen for each number from 1 to n inside the loop.
Refine the loop into control steps: iterate, check a condition for each i, and update the sum when the condition holds.
Write sub-comments for the loop body, for example: 'for i = 1..n: if (n mod i == 0) then add i to sum'; then translate those sub-comments into code.
